translations: n．小贩，摊贩：在街头或市场上出售水果、蔬菜等商品的小商贩。
· Costermongers were a common sight in the streets of London in the 19th century.
19世纪伦敦街头经常可以看到小贩。

sentences.sentence: Behind the car came a motley string of figures--street Arabs, beggars, clowns turning somersaults and costermongers hawking their wares. (E. Voynich, The Gadfly , part II, ch. V)
sentences.translation: 那辆马车后面跟着一大群各色各样的人物——流浪儿、乞丐、一路翻着筋斗的小丑以及叫卖的小贩。
